</nav>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</header>\n</div>\n</div>\n<main>\n<div>\n<div>\n<section>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<h1>Allgemeine Gesch\u00e4ftsbedingungen</h1> </div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<h2>Allgemeine Gesch\u00e4ftsbedingungen (AGBs)</h2> </div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<p><strong>\u00a7 1 Geltungsbereich</strong>Die nachfolgenden Allgemeinen Gesch\u00e4ftsbedingungen (AGB) gelten f\u00fcr alle Rechtsbeziehungen zwischen der Agentur Bridgeflow, vertreten durch Herrn Bernd Kopin, und ihren Vertragspartnern. F\u00fcr den Vertrag gelten ausschlie\u00dflich die AGB der Agentur Bridgeflow; andere Bedingungen \u2013 insbesondere solche des Vertragspartners \u2013 werden nicht Vertragsinhalt, auch wenn Bridgeflow ihnen nicht ausdr\u00fccklich widerspricht. Bridgeflow wird im Folgenden als \u201ewir\u201c und seine Vertragspartner als \u201eKunden\u201c bezeichnet. Mit der Annahme des Vertrages erkennt der Kunde diese AGB an.</p> </div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<p><strong>\u00a7 2 Vertragsgegenstand</strong>Wir analysieren die internen Arbeitsprozesse unserer Kunden und unterst\u00fctzen bei der Einf\u00fchrung des Arbeitsmanagement-Tools \u201eAsana.com\u201c. Dies umfasst insbesondere die Schulung aller relevanten Mitarbeiter des Auftraggebers. Dar\u00fcber hinaus unterst\u00fctzen wir unsere Kunden bei der Implementierung von Produktivit\u00e4tssystemen und -techniken in bestehende Software- und Prozessarchitekturen. Auf Wunsch wird auch eine individuelle Produktivit\u00e4tsberatung angeboten. Die geeignete Implementierung der auf der Analyse von BridgeFlow basierenden Systeme liegt ausschlie\u00dflich im Ermessen des Kunden; wir haben hierauf keinen Einfluss. Wir verstehen uns als Vermittler und Trainer der Systeme und bef\u00e4higen unsere Kunden, Asana.com und entsprechende Systeme selbst\u00e4ndig und langfristig einzurichten. Die tats\u00e4chliche Nutzung von Asana.com und daraus abgeleitete Zielvorgaben (z.B. Reduzierung der internen Meetings um einen bestimmten Prozentsatz) sind somit keine vertragliche Verpflichtung f\u00fcr uns. Es besteht daher kein Anspruch auf eine konkrete Zielerreichung, die nicht ausdr\u00fccklich von beiden Parteien best\u00e4tigt wurde.</p> </div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<p><strong>\u00a7 3 Vertragsabschluss</strong>Der Vertrag kommt mit der \u00dcbersendung des Vertragsangebots an den Kunden zustande und wird",

str\u00e1nku, kterou hled\u00e1te. Zkuste se vr\u00e1tit zp\u00e1tky na p\u0159edchoz\u00ed str\u00e1nku, nebo se pod\u00edvejte do na\u0161eho <a href=\"/help/linkedin?trk=404_page\" title=\"Centrum n\u00e1pov\u011bdy\">Centra n\u00e1pov\u011bdy</a> pro v\u00edce informac\u00ed</h2>\n<span><a href=\"/feed/?trk=404_page\" title=\"P\u0159ej\u00edt do informa\u010dn\u00edho kan\u00e1lu\">P\u0159ej\u00edt do informa\u010dn\u00edho kan\u00e1lu</a></span>\n</div>\n\n<div>\n<h1>Siden blev ikke fundet</h1>\n<h2>Vi kan desv\u00e6rre ikke finde den side, du leder efter. By clicking \"Accept All\", you consent to our use of cookies.\u00a0<a href=\"https://www.avoma.com/privacy-policy\">Cookie Policy</a></p></div><div><button>Customise</button> <button>Accept All</button></div></div></div></div><div><div><div><div><span>Customise Consent Preferences</span> <button><img alt=\"Close\" src=\"https://cdn-cookieyes.com/assets/images/close.svg\"/></button></div><div><div><p>We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below.</p><p>The cookies that are categorised as \"Necessary\" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site. ...\u00a0<button>Show more</button></p></div><div><div><div><div><div><button>Necessary</button><span>Always Active</span></div><div><p>Necessary cookies are required to enable the basic features of this site, such as providing secure log-in or adjusting your consent preferences. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable data.</p></div></div></div><div><div><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>__tld__</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>session</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div><p>Used for usages and dashboards in the app</p></div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>__cf_bm</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>1 hour</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>This cookie, set by Cloudflare, is used to support Cloudflare Bot Management. </div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>_cfuvid</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>session</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>Calendly sets this cookie to track users across sessions to optimize user experience by maintaining session consistency and providing personalized services</div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>__hssrc</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>session</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>This cookie is set by Hubspot whenever it changes the session cookie. The __hssrc cookie set to 1 indicates that the user has restarted the browser, and if the cookie does not exist, it is assumed to be a new session.</div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>__hssc</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>1 hour</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>HubSpot sets this cookie to keep track of sessions and to determine if HubSpot should increment the session number and timestamps in the __hstc cookie.</div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>ajs_anonymous_id</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>1 year</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>This cookie is set by Segment to count the number of people who visit a certain site by tracking if they have visited before.</div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>ajs_user_id</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>Never Expires</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>This cookie is set by Segment to help track visitor usage, events, target marketing, and also measure application performance and stability.</div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>messagesUtk</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>6 months</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>HubSpot sets this cookie to recognize visitors who chat via the chatflows tool.</div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>__cflb</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>1 hour</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>This cookie is used by Cloudflare for load balancing.</div></li></ul></div></div></div><div><div><div><div><button>Functional</button></div><div><p>Functional cookies help perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collecting feedback, and other third-party features.</p></div></div></div><div><div><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>li_gc</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>6 months</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>Linkedin set this cookie for storing visitor's consent regarding using cookies for non-essential purposes.</div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>lidc</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>1 day</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>LinkedIn sets the lidc cookie to facilitate data center selection.</div></li></ul><ul><li><div>Cookie</div><div>yt-remote-device-id</div></li><li><div>Duration</div><div>Never Expires</div></li><li><div>Description</div><div>YouTube sets this cookie to We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Privacy Policy.</p></div><p>If you decline, your information won\u2019t be tracked when you visit this website. A single cookie will be used in your browser to remember your preference not to be tracked.</p><div><div><div><button>Accept</button><button>Decline</button></div></div></div></div>\n<div>\n<header>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<div>\n<a href=\"https://bloomfire.com\">\n </a>\n</div>\n<nav><ul><li><a href=\"/platform/\">Platform</a><div><div><div><div><div><h6>Platform Overview</h6><p>Discover the power of our innovative platform and how it can \n                                 revolutionize knowledge management within your organization</p></div><a href=\"https://bloomfire.com/how-it-works/\"><div><img alt=\"Seamless workflow\" src=\"https://bloomfire.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/icon-01.svg\"/><h6>How it Works</h6></div><p>Discover the seamless workflow empowering smarter team collaboration</p></a><a href=\"/security/\"><div><img alt=\"Robust security measures and data protection\" src=\"https://bloomfire.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/icon-02.svg\"/><h6>Security</h6></div><p>Learn about our robust security measures and data protection</p></a><a href=\"/integrations/\"><div><img alt=\"Bloomfire's powerful platform integrations\" src=\"https://bloomfire.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/icon-03.svg\"/><h6>Integrations</h6></div><p>Enhance productivity with Bloomfire's powerful platform integrations</p></a></div></div><div><ul><li>Features</li><li><a href=\"https://bloomfire.com/platform/ai-enterprise-search/\"><span><img alt=\"AI Powered Search &amp;
